events.name: Market Boom
events.description: The property market is booming! All rent charges are doubled.

events.name: Economic Recession
events.description: Hard times have hit! All payments are halved (rounded up).

events.name: Property Shuffle
events.description: A city-wide reorganization! Each player must trade one property with another player.

specialRules: Each player must trade one property with another player

events.name: Government Stimulus
events.description: Everyone gets a boost! All players draw 2 extra cards.

events.name: Rent Control
events.description: The government has imposed rent control! No rent can be charged this round.

events.name: Speed Trading
events.description: Fast-paced trading! Players can play up to 5 cards this round instead of 3.

specialRules: Players can play up to 5 cards per turn

events.name: Monopoly Madness
events.description: Complete sets are more valuable! Houses and hotels provide double bonuses.

events.name: Chaos Auction
events.description: All players reveal their top card and auction it to the highest bidder!

specialRules: All players reveal top card and auction it

events.name: Wild West
events.description: Lawless times! Action cards can't be blocked with 'Just Say No' this round.

specialRules: Just Say No cards cannot be played

events.name: Lucky Day
events.description: Fortune smiles upon you! The next action card played has double effect.

specialRules: Next action card played has double effect
